Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Temporary Southbound Reroute near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne
ShortDescription: SB 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses temp. rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses are temporarily rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/State
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rrted EB: 69th,Lafayette, 71st, King Dr, & 69th; WB: 69th, King Dr, 71st, State, 69th, & Red Line due to, street blockage nr 69th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 69th/State.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, Lafayette, 71st, King Drive, and 69th.

Westbound buses will operate via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State, 69th, and the Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.
